alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 09 at 11:34AM CST until January 09 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Jasper County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1230 PM CST. * At 1133 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Bay Springs, or 10 miles north of Stringer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Turnerville around 1145 AM CST. Paulding around 1205 PM CST. Rose Hill around 1210 PM CST. Orange around 1220 PM CST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: This Tornado Warning replaces the Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued for the same area. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
